meanings.sent1: The cookie was toughish, but still tasty.
meanings.sent2: The leather jacket felt toughish against my skin.
meanings.sent3: He tried to cut the toughish steak with a plastic knife.
meanings.sent4: Her toughish attitude was like armor against criticism.
meanings.sent5: The toughish fabric withstood the rough play of the children.

meanings.sent1: The old tree had a toughish bark that protected it.
meanings.sent2: The toughish material of the bag made it durable.
meanings.sent3: The toughish look on his face softened when he smiled.
meanings.sent4: Her toughish exterior hid a kind heart within.
meanings.sent5: The toughish exterior of the building gave it a sturdy appearance.
